text: Albert Douglas Holden (28 September 1930 â€“ 7 April 2021) was an English professional footballer who played as a winger. Holden was born in Manchester, Lancashire. He made five appearances for the England national football team in 1959. Holden died on 7 April 2021, aged 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Footballers from Manchester Category:Preston North End F.C. players Category:Association football coaches
